name: Faster (itch) (Elios, Lea Roulee, Willlllliam, Louis Bertrand)
name_original: Faster (itch) (Elios, Lea Roulee, Willlllliam, Louis Bertrand)
description:
Play a spherical robot that can alternate between a heavy and magnetic body and a light and bouncing body.

Roll and hang on all surfaces.

Switch between two physical properties to fit all the situations!

Have Fun!

It is a 3C project to do enjoyable movement. It is a sandbox to enjoy to move as fast as possible. 

CREDITS

- Elias KEMMIRI
- Léa ROULEE
- William GARRABOS
- Louis BERTRAND
